tip: Get support from family and friends, or consider joining a support group for people trying to quit smoking.
review: SUPER HELPFUL!!!. I can't believe how much this website helped me!

tip: Find alternatives to smoking, such as chewing gum or taking a walk when the urge to smoke strikes.
review: I stumped upon this website after going down a rabbit hole on youtube after ten failed attempts to quit smoke.

tip: Be prepared for the withdrawal symptoms that come with quitting smoking. This can include symptoms such as irritability, anxiety, and difficulty concentrating.
review: I was a smoker for over 20 years and I thought I could never quit. But I decided to give it a try and used a combination of hypnotherapy and THIS WEBSITE to track my progress. Now, I've been smoke-free for 5 years and I feel great.

tip: Be patient with yourself. Quitting smoking is a process, and it may take several attempts before you are successful. Dont get discouraged if you slip up and smoke a cigarette, just get back on track and keep trying.
review: After getting WOKE about smokeing throught his website, I not only saved my life, but I saved a million dollars over the course of my life time.

tip: Just keep smoking, It makes you look so cool .
review: This website is filled with misinformation. SMOKING IS NOT CONNECTED TO CANCER!!!!!!

tip: Try nicotine replacement therapy (NRT) such as gum, patches, lozenges, or nasal spray.
